an1.21:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam abhavitam akammaniyam hoti yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.22:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam bhavitam kammaniyam hoti yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.23:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam abhavitam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.23:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, abhavitam mahato anatthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.24:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam bhavitam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.24:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, bhavitam mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.25:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam abhavitam apatubhutam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.25:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, abhavitam apatubhutam mahato anatthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.26:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam bhavitam patubhutam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.26:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, bhavitam patubhutam mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.27:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam abhavitam abahulikatam mahato anatthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.27:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, abhavitam abahulikatam mahato anatthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.28:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam bhavitam bahulikatam mahato atthaya samvattati yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.28:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, bhavitam bahulikatam mahato atthaya samvattati”ti.
an1.29:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam abhavitam abahulikatam dukkhadhivaham hoti yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.29:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, abhavitam abahulikatam dukkhadhivaham hoti”ti.
an1.30:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekadhammampi samanupassami yam evam bhavitam bahulikatam sukhadhivaham hoti yathayidam, bhikkhave, cittam.
an1.30:1.2: Cittam, bhikkhave, bhavitam bahulikatam sukhadhivaham hoti”ti.
